head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GORDON, B. DOUGLAS

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GORDON, B. DOUGLAS

block.p: GORDON-B. Douglas. Of Odessa, FL, died March 1, 2000. Beloved husband of Fritza von Lengerke. Brother of Marion Cross. Father of William Bruce Gordon, Elizabeth Comstock, and the late Deborah Nothstine. Grandfather of Brandon, Sarah and Kellie. Memorial service 11AM, Friday, June 23, 2000 at Christ Episcopal Church, Newton, NJ. Memorial donations to American Diabetes Association, 1701 N. Beauregard St., Alexandria, VA 22311. For information, contact Smith McCracken Funeral Home, Newton, NJ.
